slash.title: Eğik çizgi komutları geçişi
slash.description_alias:
%1$s**Çalıştırmayı denediğiniz komut yalnızca Eğik Çizgi Komutlarıyla çalışıyor** Ön ek olarak / ile çalıştırmayı deneyin. **Bu komut bir takma addı**. Orijinal komutu çalıştırmayı deneyin (`/%2$s`).

Eğik Çizgi Komutları, Discord'un yönergelerine göre komutları kullanmanın yeni yoludur. **Hala ön eklerle çalışan komutlar sonunda yalnızca eğik çizgi ile çalışır duruma geldi** Eklememiz için yeterli alan olmadığından Eğik Çizgi Komutları için komut takma adları kaldırıldı (Discord bunun için yalnızca 100 komut eklememize izin veriyordu).
slash.description:
%1$s**Çalıştırmayı denediğiniz komut yalnızca Eğik Çizgi Komutlarıyla çalışıyor** Ön ek olarak / ile çalıştırmayı deneyin (`/%2$s`).

Eğik Çizgi Komutları, Discord'un yönergelerine göre komutları kullanmanın yeni yoludur. **Hala ön eklerle çalışan komutlar sonunda yalnızca eğik çizgi ile çalışır duruma geldi** Eklememiz için yeterli alan olmadığından Eğik Çizgi Komutları için komut takma adları kaldırıldı (Discord bunun için yalnızca 100 komut eklememize izin veriyordu).
slash.description_image:
Bazı görüntü komutları için eğik çizgi komutu çalıştırmak, komutu kullanmakta olduğunuz önek yerine `/image' önekiyle kullanmayı deneyin. Örneğin, "~>catgirl", "/image catgirl" olur. Imageboard komutları bunu takip etmez.

Eğik çizgi komutlarını görmüyorsanız, https://add.mantaro.site adresindeki davet bağlantısını kullanarak botu yeniden ekleyin.
Daha fazla yardım için https://www.mantaro.site/mantaro-wiki/ adresindeki yeni wiki'yi kullanın
slash.description_2:
Eğik çizgi komutu çalıştırmak için, komutu kullanmakta olduğunuz önek yerine `/` önekiyle kullanmayı deneyin. Örneğin, `~>ping`, `/ping` olur (ve Tab a basın)

Eğik çizgi komutlarını görmüyorsanız, https://add.mantaro.site adresindeki davet bağlantısını kullanarak botu yeniden ekleyin.
Daha fazla yardım için https://www.mantaro.site/mantaro-wiki/ adresindeki yeni wiki'yi kullanın

music_usage.2: - To **queue songs from youtube or soundcloud** use `/play` For example: `/play song:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aAolFWjGfMs` *It will connect automatically to the voice channel you are in*
music_usage.3: - To **search for a song on youtube** use `/play song:<search term>` (without the leading < and >) For example: `/play song:see you again` (You need to select the number, just *select the number* after the selection box pops up!)
music_usage.4: - To **search for a song on soundcloud** use `/play song:<search term> soundcloud:true` For example `/play song:hot milk soundcloud:true`
music_usage.5: - To **check the queue** you just type `/queue show`
music_usage.6: - To **remove a track from the queue** you just need to use `/removetrack` It takes as an argument the position the song is queued at (you can check in on queue)
music_usage.8: - To **stop the music and unbind the player** use `/stop`
music_usage.10: - And lastly, to **repeat a song** use `/repeat`. Using `/repeat` while repeat is on, turns it off. You can repeat a queue running `/repeat queue:True`.
music_usage.11: For more info please use `/help command:<command name>` (without the <> and replace command name with the name of the command you want)
music_usage.12: Mantaro ile müziğe doyun! Beni kullandığın için teşekkürler, şekerim.

custom.error_running: %1$sÖzel komut kullanırken hata... Lütfen cevapta bulunan içeriği ve uzunluğunu kontrol edin (2000'den uzun olamaz unutmayın).
custom.error_running_new:
%1$sÖzel komut kullanırken hata... Lütfen cevapta bulunan içeriği ve uzunluğunu kontrol edin.
**Hata:**
```%2$s```
custom.not_loaded: Bot henüz tam olarak çalışmaya başlamamış, özel komutlar birazdan kullanıma açılır!
custom.nsfw_not_nsfw: %1$sBu komut NSFW olarak işaretlenmiş, bundan dolayı NSFW kanallar dışında kullanılamaz..
custom.new_error:
%1$sÖzel komut oluşturmaya çalışırken hata oluştu. (v3, içeriği kontrol et).
**Hata:**
```%2$s```

ls.description:
**This shows all of the custom (user-made) commands of this server.** Every command here is not associated with the bot itself in any shape or form.

Custom commands are commands created by users (usually server admins) which can handle a bunch of different situations, going as far as emulating action commands. The commands listed here use the bot prefix, not Slash Commands.
For more information on how to make custom commands refer to [this wiki page.](https://www.mantaro.site/mantaro-wiki/guides/custom-commands)
 
**List:**
ls.footer: Bu sunucudaki toplam özel komut sayısı: %1$s

custom.invalid: %1$sInvalid command selection. Maybe take a look at the wiki at <https://www.mantaro.site/mantaro-wiki/guides/custom-commands>.

view.not_found: %1$sO isimde bir özel komut burada yok.
view.less_than_specified: %1$sBu komut sizin girdiğiniz cevaptan daha az cevap içeriyor...

raw.too_large_view: Too large to view here, use `/custom view name:%1$s response:%2$s`
raw.description: Bu, bu komutun tüm yanıtlarının ham halindeki (komuta ne girdiyseniz) bir listesidir.

clear.success: %1$s**Cleared %2$d Custom Commands**. Locked/Pinned commands weren't deleted, unlock them first if you want to.

eval.not_specified: Değerlendirmek için herhangi bir şey belirtmediniz.
eval.slash_notice: %1$sThis command does not work with slash, yet. You can use `~>custom eval` for now.

deleteresponse.no_responses_left: %1$sThere were no responses left, so I removed the command.

rename.not_enough_args: %1$sYou need to specify the command you want to rename and the new name.

add.time_out: %1$sThe time for this custom command interaction has ran out (or you cancelled it, or started a new one).
add.not_enough_args: %1$sEklemek istediğin komutun ismini ve yanıtını belirtmeniz gerekir.
add.too_long: %1$sThe content of this command is too long and the bot won't be able to display it. Make sure the command has less than %2$,d characters.
add.success:
%1$sSaved to command `%2$s`
Remember: To access a custom command you create, you have to run it using Mantaro's prefix (for example `~>%2$s`), not Slash Commands.
add.too_many_responses: %1$sThere's too many responses (%2$s) on this command. This limit is double (up to 100) for premium servers (Check <https://patreon.com/mantaro>)
add.too_many_commands: %1%sBu sunucuda çok fazla komut var, bu yüzden daha fazlasını ekleyemezsiniz (+100).  Bu kısıtlama premium sunucuları etkilemez.(<https://patreon.com/mantaro> adresini kontrol edin).

lockcommand.no_permission: %1$sYou need the Manage Server permission to lock and unlock commands.
lockcommand.no_command: %1$sYou need to specify the command you want to lock.
lockcommand.success: %1$sSuccessfully locked the `%2$s` command. You'll need to unlock it for further edits.

unlockcommand.no_command: %1$sYou need to specify the command you want to unlock.
unlockcommand.success: %1$sSuccessfully unlocked the `%2$s` command. You'll need to lock it later if you want to avoid further edits.

custom.no_cc: %1$sBu sunucuda özel komut yok, sadece birazcık tozlu.
custom.admin_only:
This guild only accepts custom command creation, edits, imports and eval from administrators.
**This is now the DEFAULT setting.**
- If you want to let everyone do this, and are an admin (Bot Commander role or Manage Server permission), run `~>opts admincustom false`
custom.not_found: %1$sThere's no Custom Command `%2$s` in this Guild.
custom.invalid_image: %1$sThis command contains an invalid image, please fix...
custom.invalid_string: %1$sThe string `{%2$s}` isn't valid, or the output is longer than 2000 characters.
custom.locked_command: %1$sYou can't edit or remove this command while it's locked, please run `/custom unlockcommand name:<command name>` to unlock it.

mute.no_permissions: %1$sYou need to have permission to Moderate Members in order to time out a user.
mute.no_users: %1$sYou need to give me a user to time out.
mute.no_moderate_members: %1$sI don't have permissions to administrate timeouts on this server.
mute.time_not_specified: %1$sYou wanted time but didn't specify for how long.
mute.time_not_specified_generic: %1$sYou didn't specify any time. For example, if you want to mute for 20 minutes you should do `/mute user:<user> time:20m reason:reason goes here`, for example.
mute.default_time_too_long: %1$sThe default time out timeout length is too long (Maximum: 10 days)...
mute.time_too_little:
%1$sThe specified mute timeout length is less than 10 seconds.
You sure you used the right format? For 20 minutes, use 20m, for 1 hour, use 1h, or any combination of both (1h45m) for example.
mute.time_too_long: %1$sThe specified timeout length is too long (Maximum: 10 days)...
mute.already_muted: %1$sThis user is already timed out. Please do `/unmute` to un-mute them.
mute.self_hierarchy_error: %1$sI cannot time out this user because they're in a higher hierarchy than me, or the role is in a higher hierarchy!
mute.user_hierarchy_error: %1$sI cannot time out this user because they're in a higher hierarchy than me, or the role is in a higher hierarchy than you!
mute.success_reason: %1$sSuccessfully timed out **%2$s** for %3$s because of the following reason: %4$s

unmute.no_permissions: %1$sYou need to have permission to Moderate Members to remove a time out!
unmute.no_mentions: %1$sYou need to tell me who to remove the time out from.
unmute.not_muted: %1$sThis user doesn't seem to be timed out.

love.yourself_note: Sen dünyanın en harika insanısın, kendini biraz daha sev <3

loveletter.no_letter: %1$sEnvanterinizde aşk mektubu yok, bu yüzden mektup yazacak bir şeyin yok. Evlendikten sonra size bir aşk mektubu verilir.
loveletter.already_done: %1$sThis marriage already has a love letter assigned. Check it using `/marry status`
loveletter.cannot_see: %1$sEvli olduğunuz kullanıcıyı bulamadım... Büyük ihtimal benimle aynı sunucu da değiller.
loveletter.confirmation: %1$sAre you *sure* you want to write this letter for your marriage with **%2$s#%3$s**? This is PERMANENT while the marriage lasts. *Letter content:* %4$s. Click yes to accept, no to scrap.
loveletter.confirmed: %1$sSuccessfully delivered the love letter to your loved one! Check it using `/marry status`
loveletter.scrapped: %1$sAcele gerek yok, hala yazmak için zamanınız var!

status.no_marriage: %1$sEvli değilsin, bu yüzden sanırım durumun uh... "evli değil" (Eğer profilinde evli gözüktüğün halde bu mesajı alıyorsan, eski sistemdesin demektir. Boşanıp tekrar evlen.)

buyhouse.not_married: %1$sYou can only buy a house while you're married. This might change in the future.
buyhouse.no_house: %1$sYou need a house item in your inventory. Use `/buy item:house` to get one.
buyhouse.not_enough_money: %1$sYou don't have enough money to buy a house. (Current house price: %2$d credits)
buyhouse.no_name: %1$sYou need to give your house a name! For example, `/marry house name:cozy house`
buyhouse.confirm: %1$sAre you sure you wanna buy this house? The price deducted from your wallet is %2$d and the name you gave the house is %3$s. Click on `yes` to confirm and `no` to cancel.
buyhouse.success: %1$sYou successfully bought a house for %2$d credits. The name of your new cozy house is %3$s, enjoy!

buycar.no_car: %1$sYou need to buy a car first! Use `/buy item:car` to get one.
buycar.not_enough_money: %1$sYou don't have enough money to buy a car. (Current car price: %2$d credits)
buycar.no_name: %1$sYou need to give your car a name! For example, `/marry car name:vroom`
buycar.confirm: %1$sAre you sure you wanna buy this car? The price deducted from your wallet is %2$d and the name you gave the car is %3$s. Click on `yes` to confirm and `no` to cancel.
buycar.success: %1$sYou successfully bought a car for %2$d credits. The name of your new fast car is %3$s, enjoy!

marry.no_mention: %1$sMention the user you want to marry.
marry.marry_yourself_notice: %1$sYou cannot marry yourself, as much as you may want to.
marry.marry_bot_notice: %1$sYou cannot marry a bot. I don't think this is Futurama... yet. Wait, could bots and humans marry there?
marry.no_ring: %1$sYou cannot propose without two marriage rings! You can buy them by doing `/buy amount:2 item:ring` and then try proposing again <3
marry.confirmation:
%1$s%2$s, click the button with **yes** or **no** to the marriage proposal from %3$s
%4$sThis timeouts in 120 seconds.
marry.ring_check_fail: %1$sYou cannot marry with less than two rings on your inventory :(
marry.ratelimit_message: Why would you want to marry this much?

divorce.confirm: %1$sAre you sure you want to end this marriage? The money spent in pets, houses and cars will be split in two. Click on `yes` to continue and `no` to cancel. **Your pet will dissapear, since it's tied to the marriage**
divorce.not_married:
%1$sYou aren't married with anyone, why don't you find that special someone?
Wanna unclaim a Waifu? Use `/waifu unclaim` instead.
divorce.success:
%1$sNow you're single. That's nice I guess.
%2$s
divorce.split: The money left was split between the two parties by selling their assets (pet, house, car). Each one got **%1$d** credits on their wallet.

waifu.bot: %1$sA bot can't be a waifu, even if you want to...
waifu.notice: This feature isn't meant to have any kind of relationship, either implicit or explicit, with real life events.

stats.format:
%1$s **Money weight value:** %2$,d
%1$s **Badge weight value:** %3$,d
%1$s **Experience weight value:** %4$,d
%1$s **Claim weight value:** %5$,d
%1$s **Reputation multiplier:** %6$.2fx

claim.no_user: %1$sYou didn't mention any user to claim.
claim.locked: %1$sYou're currently unable to perform this action.
claim.key_locked: %1$sThe user you tried to claim is key-locked and cannot be claimed. They can remove it using `/profile claimlock remove:true` if they wish to do so.
claim.not_enough_money: %1$sYou don't have enough money to claim this waifu **(Cost: %2$s)**
claim.not_enough_slots: %1$sYou don't have enough slots available to claim this waifu. (Total slots: %2$s, Used slots: %3$s)
claim.not_found: %1$sI can't find any user with this query.

unclaim.no_user: %1$sYou need to mention a waifu to un-claim.
unclaim.confirmation:
%1$sAre you *sure* you want to un-claim %2$s? The cost to un-claim this waifu is **%3$s credits**. Click on *yes* to confirm or *no* to cancel
%4$sThis times out in 1 minute.
unclaim.not_enough_money: %1$sYou don't have enough money to un-claim this waifu!
unclaim.player_locked: %1$sYou cannot do this at the moment.
unclaim.success: %1$sSuccessfully unclaimed `%2$s` with a cost of **%3$s credits**.
unclaim.not_found: %1$sI can't find any user with this query. If you need to unclaim an unknown user, use their ID (`/waifu list id:true`).

buyslot.locked: %1$sYou're currently unable to perform this action.
buyslot.not_enough_money: %1$sYou don't have enough money to buy more slots! You need %2$d credits.
buyslot.success: %1$sSuccessfully bought this slot for %2$s credits, you currently have %3$s total slots and %4$s available slots.
buyslot.too_many: %1$sYou already have too many slots! The maximum is 30 slots.

optout.notice: %1$sYou've opted out of the entire waifu system, so you can't use this.
optout.warning:
%1$sDo you want to opt-out from the waifu system? THIS IS PERMANENT AND CAN'T BE REVERTED. Seriously.
If you only want to be opted out of new claims and wanna use the waifu system as usual, please use `/profile claimlock` instead.
You won't be able to claim or be claimed, and all the claims over you will be removed.
Click on `yes` to opt-out PERMANENTLY or `no` to cancel this and go back to safety.
optout.success: %1$sYou successfully opted out of the waifu system.
optout.claim_notice: %1$sThe user you're trying to claim opted out.
optout.lookup_notice: %1$sThe user you're trying to lookup opted out.

waifu.description_header:
Here's a list with all of your beloved waifus, sorted by addition date.
*You can have a maximum of %1$,d waifus as of now.*

If you wish to check your waifu stats, use `/waifu stats`
waifu.no_waifu:
No waifus to see here, just dust :(
You can get waifus by claiming someone! Use `/waifu claim` to get started.

roll.size: Doing **%1$,d rolls** with a die of **%2$,d sides**.
roll.incorrect_format: You need to specify the amount in d20 format. For example, to roll 2 dies of 16 sides, you can do 2d16.

coinflip.over_limit: %1$sHold in there! The limit is 1,000 coin flips
coinflip.no_repetitions: %1$sYou need to specify an Integer for the amount of repetitions (For example, `/roll times:100`)
coinflip.success: %1$s Your result from **%2$d** time(s) yielded **%3$d** heads and **%4$d** tails

inventory.bot_notice: %1$sHere, bots have no inventory. Well, sometimes you might wish they had one but then it would only be a `/dump`
inventory.brief:
**%1$s's item collection** %2$s

*For a detailed version, use `/inventory show`. Enjoy your day!*
inventory.calculate: %1$s%2$s will get **%3$d credits** if all of the items are sold.
inventory.brief_notice: You can use `/inventory brief` to get a mobile friendly version.

cast.no_item_specified: %1$sYou didn't specify any items. For a list, check `/cast list`
cast.no_item_found: %1$sI didn't find any item matching that. Make sure to type the full item name to avoid mismatches, or use the emoji if you can. Example: `/cast star pick`
cast.item_not_cast: %1$sYou cannot cast this item. You can check `/cast list` for a list of castable items. Try using the full name if you think you have the correct item.
cast.not_enough_money: %1$sYou don't have enough money to cast this. **(Cost: %2$s)**
cast.no_item: %1$sYou don't have the necessary item *%2$s* to proceed with this cast. You need %3$,d of them.
cast.not_enough_items: %1$sYou don't have enough of item *%2$s* to proceed the cast of a **%3$s**. **(Needed: %4$s, Current: %5$s)**
cast.no_tool: %1$sYou need to have a %2$s to proceed with this cast!
cast.not_equipped:
%1$sYou don't have any equipped wrench. Use `/equip item:<wrench name>` to equip a wrench and start your adventure! If you don't have any, first run `/buy item:wrench`.
You don't have to specify the wrench used in this command anymore. To cast multiple items, put the number before the item name, for example: `/cast item item:star pick amount:5`
cast.too_many: %1$sYou'd have more than 5,000 of this item if you proceed. Try casting less of this object?
cast.low_tier: %1$sYou need at least a Tier 2 wrench (at least a Comet Wrench) to cast more items per call. You currently have a Tier %2$s wrench equipped.
cast.not_enough_wrench_level: %1$sYour wrench is not powerful enough to cast this item. Maybe equip a more powerful one? (*Wrench level: %2$s, Required level: %3$s*)
cast.too_many_amount: %1$sYou can't cast that many of this item at once! Limit: %2$s, Attempt: %3$s. A sparkle wrench makes the limit double! Unless you're already using one.

autoequip.success: %1$sAutomatically equipped a **%2$s** on your wrench slot.

ls.desc:
This is a list of the items you can cast using `/cast list`.
You can use full name or the short name, or the emoji.
**Casting has a minimum cost of half the price of the item, which is shown below.**.
Wrench tier 2 and 3 are comet and sparkle, respectively.

cast.dust: %1$sYou cannot cast with such a dusty inventory! *(Dust level: %2$s%%)*. Why not clean it up using `/use item item:mop`?
cast.wrench_multiple_use: Tip: *You can't use the wrench you are trying to cast with as ingredient!*

dump.replacement: You can use `/dump` now. For example, instead of `~>market dump floppy` you can do `/dump item:floppy`. Please use the new command instead... I wonder what happened to all the floppies you all threw away?
dump.no_item: %1$sYou need to specify the amount of that item (if it's only one, you don't need to specify the amount) and the item that you want to dump.
dump.invalid: %1$sNot a valid number of items to dump.
dump.non_existent: %1$sCannot dump a non-existent item! If you're lost, you can try typing the short name or wrapping the name in quotes.
dump.player_no_item: %1$sCannot dump an item you don't have!
dump.more_items_than_player: %1$sYou cannot dump more items than what you have.

price.no_item: %1$sYou need to specify the item you want to check the price of.
price.non_existent: %1$sCannot check the price of a non-existent item. If you're lost, you can try typing the short name or wrapping the name in quotes.
price.no_price: %1$sThis item is not available neither for sell or buy (could be an exclusive collectible)
price.collectible: %1$sThis is a collectible item. (Sell value: %2$d credits)
price.success: %1$sThe market value of %2$s**%3$s** is %4$s credits to buy it and you can get %5$s credits if you sell it.

sell.replacement: You can use `/sell` now. For example, instead of `~>market sell pick` you can do `/sell item:pick`. Please use the new command instead.
sell.no_item: %1$sYou need to specify the item to sell.
sell.no_item_amount: %1$sYou need to specify the amount of that item (if it's only one, you don't need to specify the amount) and the item that you want to sell.
sell.invalid: %1$sNot a valid number of items to sell.

all.confirmation: %1$sAre you *sure* you want to sell **all** of your items? This will clear your *whole* inventory. If you wanna sell individual items please use the amount. Click on *yes* to confirm and *no* to cancel
all.success: %1$sYou sold all your inventory items and gained %2$,d credits!

sell.non_existent: %1$sYou cannot sell a non-existent item. If you're lost, you can try typing the short name or wrapping the name in quotes.
sell.no_sell_price: %1$sYou cannot sell an item that cannot be sold. (But you can `/dump` it)
sell.no_item_player: %1$sYou cannot sell an item you don't have.
sell.more_items_than_player: %1$sYou cannot sell more items than what you have.

buy.replacement: You can use `/buy` now. For example, instead of `~>market buy pick` you can do `/buy item:pick`. Please use the new command instead.
buy.no_item: %1$sYou need to specify the item to buy.
buy.no_item_amount: %1$sYou need to specify the amount of that item (if it's only one, you don't need to specify the amount) and the item that you want to buy.
buy.invalid: %1$sNot a valid number of items to buy.
buy.non_existent: %1$sYou cannot buy an non-existent item. If you're lost, you can try typing the short name or wrapping the name in quotes. Also, the item amount goes before the item name, example: `/buy amount:15 item:energy`
buy.no_buy_price: %1$sYou cannot buy an item that cannot be bought.
buy.item_limit_reached: %1$sYou cannot buy more of that object. You can only have a maximum of 5000 of any item.
buy.success: %1$sBought %2$,d %3$s for %4$,d credits successfully. You now have %5$,d credits.
buy.success_breakable: %1$sBought %2$,d %3$s for %4$,d credits successfully. You now have %5$,d credits. You can equip this using `/equip item:<item name>`
buy.success_potion: %1$sBought %2$,d %3$s for %4$,d credits successfully. You now have %5$,d credits. You can use this potion or buff using `/use item item:<item name>`
buy.not_enough_money: %1$sYou don't have enough money to buy this item. Current: %2$,d credits, Needed: %3$,d credits.
buy.success_breakable_upgrade: You can check <https://www.mantaro.site/mantaro-wiki/currency/103> for more information on how to upgrade your tools!

market.reference: You can buy and sell items using `/buy item:<item>` and `/sell item:<item>` respectively. Check `/help market` for more info.

itemtransfer.bot_notice: %1$sYou cannot transfer items to a bot.
itemtransfer.locked_notice: %1$sYou cannot transfer items now. (Player is locked)
itemtransfer.locked_notice_other: %1$sYou cannot transfer items to this user for now. (Player is locked)
itemtransfer.overflow: %1$sThis player has the maximum amount (5000) of this item.
itemtransfer.overflow_after: %1$sAfter transferring the item, the player would have more than the maximum amount (5000) of this item.
itemtransfer.multiple_items_error: %1$sYou don't have any of these items in your inventory
itemtransfer.error: %1$sYou don't have enough of this item in your inventory to do this!
itemtransfer.no_item_mention: %1$sYou need to specify the person to transfer the item to and the item to transfer.

transfer.new_account_notice_yourself: %1$sYour account must be at least 14 days old to transfer money.
transfer.new_account_notice_other: %1$sThe account you're transferring to must be at least 14 days old.
transfer.bot_notice: %1$sYou cannot transfer money to a bot.
transfer.no_amount: %1$sYou need to specify the amount. Use the `/transferitems` command instead if you meant to transfer an item.
transfer.over_transfer_limit: %1$sYou cannot transfer this much money. (Limit: %2$d credits)
transfer.receipt_overflow_notice: Cannot send money to this player.
transfer.no_money_notice: %1$sYou cannot transfer money you don't have.
transfer.receipt_over_limit: %1$sThis user already has too much money...
transfer.item_transfer: %1$sYou cannot transfer items using transfer, use the `/transferitems` command instead.
transfer.party: You can only transfer to the same person (%1$s) once every 10 minutes.

ls.desc: This is a list of all interactive items in Mantaro. For more info about interactive items check the wiki!

useitem.use_command: %1$sFor this item you need to use the command that's linked to the item! (mine for pick, fish for the fishing rod)
useitem.no_items_specified: %1$sYou need to specify what item to use.
useitem.interactive_no_action: %1$sThis item has been marked as interactive, but has no action set. This item might use its own command? For example, picks use `/mine`
useitem.no_item: %1$sYou don't have this item in your inventory.
useitem.not_enough_items: %1$sYou don't have enough of this item.
useitem.invalid_amount: %1$sThe amount needs to be a valid number between `1` and `15`!

opts.note:
%1$sHey, if you're lost or want help on using opts, check <https://www.mantaro.site/mantaro-wiki/basics/server-configuration> for a guide on how to use opts.
Note: Only administrators, people with Manage Server or people with the Bot Commander role can use this command!

list.header:
**Mantaro's Options List**
%1$s*All options must be prefixed with `~>opts` when running them*
%2$s

8ball.no_args: %1$sYou need to specify what you want the 8ball to answer.
8ball.error: %1$sI ran into an error while fetching the 8ball results.

list.name: Autorole name:
list.no_autoroles: There aren't any autoroles setup in this server.
list.description: This are the current user-assignable auto roles on this server. You can use these by doing `/iam add name:<name of the role>`

iam.deleted_role: %1$sThe role that this autorole corresponded to has been deleted
iam.error: %1$sI couldn't take **%2$s** from you. Make sure that I have permission to add roles (Manage Roles) and that my role is above **%2$s**
iam.no_role: %1$sThere isn't an autorole with the specified name.
iam.privileged_role: %1$sThis role has administrative permissions that prevent me from giving it.
iam.no_iam: %1$sYou need to specify which auto-assignable role you want to assign yourself!

iamnot.no_args: %1$sYou have to specify what role you want me to remove from you, silly.
iamnot.success: %1$s%2$s, the role **%3$s** has been taken from you.

poll.missing:
%1$sYou didn't include either the %2$s argument or it was empty!
%3$s
poll.invalid:
%1$sThis poll cannot build. **Remember that the options must be a maximum of 9 and a minimum of 2 and the timeout must be a maximum of 2d and a minimum of 2m.**
Options are separated with a comma, for example `1,2,3` (no spaces between them!). For spaced stuff use quotation marks at the start and end of the sentence. If you're really lost, there's an example on `/help poll`

ls.desc:
This is a list of all of the currently obtainable badges on Mantaro. This list contains the name and description of the badge, which should give you a overall picture of what you need to achieve it.
If you think you got a badge and you don't see it on your personal badge list, use `/profile show` and then run `/badges show` again.
Good luck, badge hunters!

badges.profile_notice: If you think you got a new badge and it doesn't appear here, please use `/profile show` and then run this command again.
badges.info_notice: Use `/badges info badge:<badge name>` to get more information about a badge. [You can also check the wiki](https://www.mantaro.site/mantaro-wiki/currency/badges)
badges.footer: Rozetler aynı başarımlar gibidir, botu kullandıkça veya oyunlara katıldıkça tek tek kazanılır.

birthday.no_guild_birthdays:
%1$sThings seems a bit empty here.
Remember that cache refreshes every 23h and that now people have to run `/birthday allowserver` to allow this server to announce their birthdays.
birthday.no_guild_month_birthdays:
%1$sThere are no birthdays for this month (%2$s) here :(
%3$sIf you just setup the birthday announcer, please wait a bit until running this again. (Cache refreshes every 23h)
Remember that now people have to run `/birthday allowserver` to allow this server to announce their birthdays.
birthday.error: %1$sDoğum günlerini alırken bir hata oldu. (içsel bir hata) :(
birthday.header:
**%1$s's Birthdays for %2$s**
Birthday cache is updated every 23 hours, so if your birthday doesn't appear here, don't panic and wait it out. Showing up to 100 results.
birthday.full_header:
**%1$s's Birthdays**
%2$s
Remember that birthdays are cached every 23 hours and that they have to run `/birthday allowserver`. Showing up to 100 results.
birthday.error_date:
%1$sThe date you entered is either not a valid date or I can't parse it properly. Please try with the correct formatting.
Remember that the date format is `dd/mm` (For example, use `/birthday 16-11` for the 16th of November).
If the month or day has only one digit you need to append a 0 to it. For example, 14/7 would become 14/07 and 7/12 would become 07/12.
birthday.added_birthdate: %1$sSuccessfully added birth date. New birthday date: %2$s *(Format: dd-MM)* [day-month]. For this server to announce your birthday, you now have to run `/birthday allowserver`%3$s
birthday.invalid_month: %1$sGeçerli bir ay değil! (Geçerli aylar 1 ve 12 arasındadır.)
birthday.no_content: %1$sYou need to specify your birthday, `remove` to reset your birthday or `month` to check the birthday month list. Then, for this server to announce your birthday, you now have to run `/birthday allowserver`
birthday.new_format: %1$sThe new date format is just `dd-mm` (day-month, for example 20-10 as for 20th of October). No need to enter your year now, so you can omit that part.
birthday.allowed_server: %1$sAllowed the current server to announce your birthday. To deny it in the future, just run `/birthday denyserver` on this server.
birthday.denied: %1$sDenied the current server from announcing your birthday. To allow it in the future, just run `/birthday allowserver` on this server.
birthday.already_denied: %1$sThis server already can't announce your birthday. If you want to allow it, run `/birthday allowserver` instead. This is the default.
birthday.leap: Your birthday is on the 29th of February, which means it'll get announced on the 29th on leap years, and on the 28th of February on non-leap years.
birthday.already_allowed: %1$sYou already allowed this server to show your birthday.

pet.explanation:
Pets are a useful companion in currency!
They help you gain more money, loot more, find random stuff on mine, chop trees, and even catch fish. The higher the level, the higher the rewards!
Getting the right pet for your activities is important, so make sure to check the type and abilities of the pet you want to choose!
Remember that you need to feed your pet and give it water, aswell as let it rest and charge up in energy every once in a while, just like a real pet! You can even pat it :)
There's two types: Personal (for yourself) and Marriage (shared between your partner and you). Choose one with `/pet choice`. The default is Personal.
For more help, use `/help command:pet` and `/pet list` for a list of pets.
pet.no_marriage: %1$sYou need to be married to have a marriage pet. Check `/help command:marry` and `/pet explanation`
pet.no_marriage_other: %1$s%2$s needs to be married to have a marriage pet. Check `/help command:marry` and `/pet explanation`

status.pet_in_other_category: %1$sYou have a pet on the %2$s choice (%3$s). You can switch to it with `/pet choice type:%2$s`
status.description:
Remember to take care and love your pet :heart:
See `/pet explanation` and `/help command:pet` for an explanation.

water.success: %1$sYay! Successfully gave your pet %2$d water and it recovered %3$s%% of their thirst. Their thirst is now %4$s%% quenched.

activity.low_stamina: %1$s**%2$s** has a really low stamina. Give it food/water to replenish.
activity.low_health: %1$s**%2$s** has really low health. Give it food/water and let it rest for a while to replenish.
activity.low_hunger: %1$s**%2$s** is too hungry to do anything right now. *Fooood~*
activity.low_thirst: %1$s**%2$s** is too thirsty to do anything right now.
activity.low_mood: %1$s**%2$s** has too low of a mood. You might wanna play with them!
activity.dusty: %1$s**%2$s** is too dusty. Clean your pet to clear the dust.
activity.success_fish: %1$s**%2$s** successfully helped you catch fish! **You got an extra %3$,d credits and %4$,d items** thanks to the extra work your pet was able to do for you! *included on what you got*
activity.success_chop: %1$s**%2$s** successfully helped you chop a tree! **You got an extra %3$,d credits and %4$,d items** thanks to the extra work your pet was able to do for you! *included on what you got*
activity.success_mine: %1$s**%2$s** successfully helped you mine! **You got an extra %3$,d credits and more item drop chances** thanks to the extra work your pet was able to do for you! *included on what you got*

rename.no_pet: %1$sYou don't have a pet to rename. (Choice: %2$s)%3$s

remove.no_pet: %1$sYou don't have a pet to remove. (Choice: %2$s)%3$s
remove.confirm:
%1$sAre you sure you wanna remove this pet? The person you're married to will receive %2$,d credits, and you will receive %2$,d credits aswell.
Click on `yes` to confirm or `no` otherwise. Keep in mind your refund won't scale with levels or anything, so take this as buying a new tomagotchi or something similar.

%1$sAre you sure you wanna remove this pet? You will receive %2$,d credits.
Click on `yes` to confirm or `no` otherwise. Keep in mind your refund won't scale with levels or anything, so take this as buying a new tomagotchi or something similar.
remove.success: %1$sSuccessfully removed pet. Every person in this marriage received %2$s credits as a refund.
remove.success_personal: %1$sSuccessfully removed pet. You received %2$s credits as a refund.

ls.desc:
This is a list of the items you can salvage using `/salvage`.
You can use full name, short name or the emoji
Salvaging has a cost of 1/3rd the price of the item, which is shown below.
You will only get one item of the listed here, choosen randomly.
Wrench tier 2 and 3 are comet and sparkle, respectively.

help.title: Mantaro Help
help.base_category: Command list for category %1$s. For a detailed guide, please check the [wiki](https://www.mantaro.site/mantaro-wiki). [Currency Guide](https://www.mantaro.site/mantaro-wiki/currency/101)
help.base_prefix:
**Full prefix command list**. For a detailed guide, please check our [wiki](https://www.mantaro.site/mantaro-wiki).
Remember you can get more information on a command using `~>help <name of command>` to see all commands use `/help` and press Tab.
**Keep in mind a lot of commands are now slash-only, this only shows prefix commands.**
help.base:
**Full slash command list**. For a detailed guide, please check our [wiki](https://www.mantaro.site/mantaro-wiki).
Remember you can get more information on a command using `/help command:<name of command>`
help.support: If you're still lost you can join the [support server](https://support.mantaro.site). You can also follow me on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mantarodiscord) for updates.
help.patreon: **[We need your help to keep Mantaro online! Click here for more info.](https://www.patreon.com/mantaro)**
help.disabled_commands: Only showing non-disabled commands. Total disabled commands: %1$s
help.channel_specific_disabled_commands: Only showing non-disabled commands. Total channel-specific disabled commands: %1$s

extended.no_help: %1$sThere's no extended help set for this command.
extended.not_found: %1$sA command with this name doesn't exist

help.too_long: Error displaying sub-command help. Check the [wiki](https://www.mantaro.site/mantaro-wiki) for more information on this specific command.
help.include_warning: **Don't include <> or [] on the command itself.**
help.subcommand_help:
Note: To get help about a subcommand you can use the subcommand name alongside the command name, for example to get the help for `/cast item` you can use `/help command:cast item`.
This goes for all subcommands, as long as they have some sort of help.

repair.no_item: %1$sYou didn't specify any item to repair. If you think you have the correct item, try using the full name.
repair.no_item_found: %1$sI can't find that item. If you think you have the correct item, try using the full name.
repair.no_main_item: %1$sYou don't have the item you're trying to repair (%2$s)
repair.cant_repair: %1$s**%2$s** it's not an item you can repair. You can only repair broken items.
repair.no_tool: %1$sYou need a Tier 2 (at least Comet Wrench) or above wrench to repair this item. You can equip one if needed (`/equip item:Comet Wrench`, for example)
repair.dust: %1$sYour inventory it's too dusty to perform a repair. Dust level: %2$s
repair.not_wrench: %1$sYou can't use this as a wrench. Remember to use quotes if the name has spaces.
repair.not_enough_level: %1$sYou need a higher tier wrench to perform this repair. You can equip one if needed (`/equip item:Comet Wrench`, for example)
repair.not_enough_money: %1$sYou don't have enough money to repair this item. *(Wallet: %2$,d, Needed: %3$,d)*
repair.no_item_recipe: %1$sYou don't have the necessary *%2$s* to perform this repair.
repair.not_enough_items: %1$sYou don't have enough of *%2$s* to perform this repair on a **%3$s**. **(Needed: %4$s, Current: %5$s)**
repair.success: %1$sRepair successful! Repaired item %2$s **%3$s** -> %4$s **%5$s**. The repair cost was *%6$s* credits and the recipe to repair it was *%7$s*.

ls.desc:
This is a list of the items you can repair using `/repair`.
You can use full name or the short name, or the emoji.
Repairing has a minimum cost of 1/3rd of the item cost, which is shown below alongside the needed materials. You need at least a Comet Wrench to repair something.

check_data.terminology: **Useful terminology:** [] = empty list, null = not set, {} = empty object. If you see numbers=[...] it means that for that id, it applies what's inside the brackets. Objects are usually comma-separated
check_data.footer: This is a debug command, therefore it's not 100% user-friendly

birthday_enable.no_args: %1$sYou need to specify the channel name and the role name.
birthday_enable.administrative_role: %1$sThis role contains administrative permissions and therefore cannot be set as a Birthday role.
birthday_enable.public_role: %1$sYou cannot set the everyone role as a birthday role! Remember that the birthday role is a role that gets assigned to the person when the birthday comes, and then removes when the day passes away.
birthday_enable.autorole: %1$sYou cannot set the autorole role as a birthday role! Remember that the birthday role is a role that gets assigned to the person when the birthday comes, and then removes when the day passes away.
birthday_enable.warning: %1$sRemember that the birthday role is a role that gets assigned to the person when the birthday comes, and then removes when the day passes away.If you have any doubts on how to configure it, you can always join our support guild and ask. You can also check `~>opts help birthday enable` for an example.
birthday_enable.warning_1: This is because of how the birthday assigner works: It assigns a temporary role to the person having its birthday, and un-assigns it when the birthday day has passed. **This means that everyone with the birthday role will get the role removed the day the birthday passes through**. Please take caution when choosing what role to use, as a misconfiguration might make bad things happen (really)!
birthday_enable.warning_2: The role *has to be a newly created role or a role you don't use for anyone else*. It MUST NOT be a role you already have on your users. Users will need to allow this server to announce their birthday by using `/birthday allowserver` else their birthday won't appear! Read <https://www.mantaro.site/mantaro-wiki/guides/birthday-announcer> for more info.
birthday_enable.warning_3: Additionally the birthday cache (what is used to store them) is only updated every 23 hours. Meaning if you set your birthday today to tomorrow to test this announcer it will **not** work.
birthday_enable.warning_4: Type **yes** if you agree to set the role %2$s as a birthday role, and **no** to cancel. This timeouts in 45 seconds.

discord_permissions.view_channel: Metin Kanallarını Okuyun ve Ses Kanallarını Görün

explanation.pick: Yerel pazardan satın aldığınız normal bir kazma. Bazı şeyleri kazmak için yeterince sağlam görünüyor.
explanation.diamond_pick: Elmas kazma, piyasadan alabileceğin demir kazmalardan kesinlikle daha güçlüdür, orası kesin!
explanation.comet_pick:
Bazı Kuyruklu Yıldız Parçaları buldunuz ve onlardan bir Kuyruklu Yıldız Mücevheri yapabileceğinizi fark ettiniz.
Onlar ne yaptı? Özel miydiler?
Parıltısından etkilendikten sonra denemeye hevesli görünüyordunuz, işte buradayız, daha güçlü seçimler elde etmek için ilk adımınız.
explanation.star_pick:
Belki parıltıydı, belki galaksideki çok uzak bir yıldızdan geldikleri gerçeğiydi, ama özel özelliklere sahip oldukça sağlam bir seçim gibi görünüyordu.
Garip... daha fazla mücevher çekiyor gibi görünüyor. Malzemenin etkisi mi yoksa yeteneğim mi gelişiyor?
explanation.moon_pick:
Ay benzeri madde sizi büyüledi.
Dolunay gibi parladığı gerçeği mi yoksa kendi kendine yüzüyormuş gibi göründüğü gerçeği mi?
Ne olursa olsun, bunu mevcut kazmanızla birleştirmeye çalıştınız ve sonuç oldukça tatmin ediciydi.
Aydınlık ve karanlık arasında iyi bir denge gibi görünüyor ve bir şekilde onunla bazı mücevherler çıkarıyorum.
Bu gerçekten çok uzak bir aydan gelen bir parça mı?
explanation.sparkle_pick:
Bir şey seni mağaralara bakmaya zorladı ve tepesinde parıldayan bir mücevher buldun. Yukarıya bakarken, bazıları kazmanızın üzerine düştü ve kazmanın tüm mağarayı aydınlatmaya yetecek kadar parlamasına neden oldu.
Çabuk, parıldayan parçalardan bazılarını al ve bir döküm istasyonuna götür.
Kazma güneş gibi parlıyor... ve oldukça sert görünüyor... demirle nasıl bu kadar iyi kaynaştı?
explanation.hellfire_pick:
Tüm elementler arasındaki reaksiyonlar tuhaf ve tehlikeli bir süreç olabilir.
Arkadaşların sana ne söylerse söylesin, bu konuyu araştırmaya karar verdin ve şimdiye kadar gördüğün her şeyden daha parlak bir nesne buldun...
Diğer tüm unsurların bir karışımı gibi görünüyor, ama oldukça da reaktif görünüyor... aynı zamanda oldukça sert, onu kırabilecek pek bir şey yok gibi görünüyor...
Bu dünya için iyilik mi yaptım, yoksa bilinmeyeni mi canlandırdım?
explanation.axe: Yerel pazardan satın aldığınız normal bir balta. Bazı ağaçları kesmek için yeterince iyi.
explanation.comet_axe: Kuyruklu Yıldız Parçalarını kazmanızda test ettikten sonra, onları baltanızda da kullanabileceğinizi fark ettiniz. Onu daha güçlü ve daha parlak yaptı.
explanation.star_axe:
Uzaklardaki bir yıldızdan gelen parlak bir parıltı, ama senin ellerinde.
Görünüşe göre ağaç kesme işi bu yeni, parlak baltayla devam edebilir. İlk başta tuhaf görünüyordun: Bu, daha fazla odun çıkarmama nasıl yardımcı olabilir?
Eh, yakında nedenini anladın...
explanation.sparkle_axe:
Burada bir ışıltı, orada bir parlama!
Balta güneş gibi parlıyor... ve oldukça sert görünüyor... demirle nasıl bu kadar iyi kaynaştı?
explanation.moon_axe:
Bu baltaya baktığınızda, yaydığı ay gibi parıltıyla büyülenmiş görünüyorsunuz.
Dolunay gibi parladığı gerçeği mi yoksa kendi kendine yüzüyormuş gibi göründüğü gerçeği mi?
Büyülendin, bu maddeyi baltana attın ve... bum!
Sonuçlar iyi görünüyor. Ağaçları da daha hızlı kesiyor gibi görünüyor. Neden bu kadar keskin? Bu gerçekten çok uzak bir aydan gelen bir parça mı?
explanation.hellfire_axe:
Tüm elementler arasındaki reaksiyonlar tuhaf ve tehlikeli bir süreç olabilir.
Elementlerde zaten ustalaştın ve onu baltanla birleştirmek artık önemsiz görünüyordu. Belki parıltıydı, belki ateşti ama bunu yapmak zorundaydın.
Harikalar yaratıyor. Hiçbir şey karşılaştırılamaz. Ama yine de gerçekten doğru şeyi yapıp yapmadığınızı merak ediyorsunuz.
explanation.rod: Yerel balıkçı pazarından satın aldığınız bir olta. Sağlam görünüyor.
explanation.comet_rod: Kuyruklu Yıldız Parçalarını baltanızda test ettikten sonra, bunları oltanızda da kullanabileceğinizi fark ettiniz. İpliği daha güçlü hale getirdi ve daha fazla balık çekiyor gibi. İsteyebileceğin her şey.
explanation.star_rod: Bu parçanın büyüleyici ve parlak parıltısı göz ardı edilemezdi. Onu oltanın ipiyle birleştirdin ve balık içinden akarak geldi! Yem her zaman gerekli değil gibi görünüyor, ama yine de kullanışlı.
explanation.moon_rod:
Bu mücevherin kendi kendine yüzmesinden hala etkileniyorsunuz. Ne olursa olsun, elinizden geldiğince en iyi şekilde oltanızın ipliğiyle kaynaştırırsınız.
Yıldız Parçalarıyla infüzyonlu bir oltadan biraz daha güçlü gibi görünüyor, ama fazla değil.
Her iki durumda da, onu ilk gördüğünüz günmüş gibi parıltısının tadını çıkarırsınız.
explanation.sparkle_rod:
Burada bir ışıltı, orada bir parlama!
Parıldayan Parçaları toz haline getirdin ve oltanın ipini onunla kapladın.
Kafan karışmış görünüyor. Bu balıkları nasıl çekebilir?
Dünyanın birçok gizemi var ve bu da onlardan biri. Belki daha fazla kredi almanıza yardımcı olabilir. Belki sizi tatmin edebilir.
Denizde bıraktığı ışıltı muhteşem ve saatlerce ona bakıyorsunuz. Belki de sonuçta doğru olanı yaptın.
explanation.hellfire_rod:
Tüm elementler arasındaki reaksiyonlar tuhaf ve tehlikeli bir süreç olabilir.
Elementlerde zaten ustalaştınız ve onu olta ipliğinizle birleştirmek artık önemsiz görünüyordu. Belki parıltıydı, belki ateşti ama bunu yapmak zorundaydın.
Harikalar yaratıyor. Balıklar size sürüler halinde geliyor. Hiçbir şey bununla karşılaştırılamaz. Ama yine de gerçekten doğru şeyi yapıp yapmadığınızı merak ediyorsunuz.
explanation.wrench: Pazardan satın alabileceğiniz bir dizi ingiliz anahtarı. Eşyaları onarmak için kullanışlıdır.
explanation.comet_wrench: Kuyruklu Yıldız Mücevherleri ile aşılanmış bir İngiliz Anahtarı. Nedense çok daha sağlam geliyor.
explanation.sparkle_wrench: Parıldayan Parçalar ile aşılanmış bir İngiliz Anahtarı. Nedense çok daha sağlam geliyor.

description.headphones: Çok fazla müzik dinlersen böyle olur. Bir şeye değer olmalı, tho.
description.racket: Discord ile pinpon oyununu birkaç milisaniye farkla kazandım. Belki.

description.tuxedo: Bir kızla evlenirken ya da güzel bir yere giderken ya da belki her yere giderken ne giyersin, kim bilir?
description.shoes: 'Çünkü yalınayak yürümek çok kötü. Ya da acı verici.
description.rose: Aşkınızın vücut bulmuş hali. Ayrıca güzel bir dekorasyon.
description.die_2: Even more loaded. `Leftover from Currency version 1. No longer obtainable.`

description.berserk: Currency Berserker? Anyone? `Leftover from Currency version 1. No longer obtainable.`
description.companion: Aw, such a cute dog. `Leftover from Currency version 1. No longer obtainable.`
description.special_ring: It's so special, it's not even a ring. `Leftover from Currency version 1. No longer obtainable.`
description.enchancer: A broken enchanter, I wonder if it could be fixed? `Leftover from Currency version 1. No longer obtainable.`
description.prize: Pretty much, huh? `Leftover from Currency version 1. No longer obtainable.`

description.prize_2: İlk olarak, bu kadar parayı nasıl kazandın?
description.slot_ticket: Slotlarda size ekstra şans verir, aynı zamanda toplu depolama olarak da çalışır.
description.bell: Christmas event 2017/2018 reward. Gives you a cozy christmas feeling on your tree.
description.tree: Christmas event 2017/2018 reward. Who doesn't like a christmas tree?.
description.haste: Bazı ekonomi komutlarından daha fazla şey toplamanıza izin verir. 4 komuttan sonra biter.
description.energy: Bir aletin vuruş başına daha az dayanıklılık kaybetmesini sağlar. 4 komuttan sonra biter.
description.rod: Balıkçılık aktiviteleriniz için temel bir çubuk.
description.tropical_fish: Çok tropikal bir balık. Balık tutarken yakalandı.
description.blowfish: Merak ediyorum... bu iyi mi? Balık tutarken yakalandı.
description.comet_gem: Madencilik yaparken bulduğunuz bir kuyruklu yıldızın parçaları. Döküm için kullanışlıdır.
description.star_gem: Madencilik yaparken bulduğunuz kayan bir yıldızın parçaları.
description.cobweb: Bir örümceğin madende bıraktığı bir şey. Bir şeye değer mi merak ediyorum.
description.fragment: Eski bir mücevher parçası. Döküm için kullanışlıdır.
description.mop: Etrafınızdaki tüm tozları temizlemenin keyifli bir yolu. Eminim çok vardır.
description.claim_key: This item makes you un-claimeable (as a waifu) when you run `/waifu claimlock`
description.coffee: Güne başlamak için keyifli bir yol.
description.waifu_pill: Waifus'larınızdan birinin değeri 20.000'in üzerindeyse, size madende ve balıklarda önemli bir avantaj sağlar. 3 seans sürer.
description.wrench: Döküm aracı. Eşyaları bir araya getirmek için kullanışlıdır.
description.comet_wrench: Döküm aracı. Eşyaları bir araya getirmek için kullanışlıdır. Biraz daha az kırılma şansı vardır, bazı eşyaları atmak için gereklidir. 3. Kademe.
description.star_wrench: Döküm aracı. Eşyaları bir araya getirmek için kullanışlıdır. Daha az kırılma şansı vardır, aynı anda birden fazla eşya atmak için gereklidir. 3. Kademe.
description.sparkle_wrench: Döküm aracı. Eşyaları bir araya getirmek için kullanışlıdır. Daha az kırılma şansı vardır. Döküm başına daha az maliyetli. 4. Kademe.
description.sparkle: Çevredeki en nadir mücevherlerden biri. Sakladıgınızdan emin olun. Parıldayan kazma ve parıldayan oltaları dökmek için kullanılır.
description.mine_crate: A gem you found while mining. Might have some nice stuff inside. Can be opened with `/opencrate crate:gem crate`
description.fish_crate: A treasure you found while fishing. Might have some nice stuff inside. Can be opened with `/opencrate crate:treasure`
description.mine_premium_crate: A gem you found while mining. Might have some nice stuff inside. Can be opened with `/opencrate crate:gem premium crate`
description.fish_premium_crate: A treasure you found while fishing. Might have some nice stuff inside. Can be opened with `/opencrate crate:premium treasure`
description.shell: Okyanusun dibinde bulundu. Neye değer olabilir?
description.moon: Ay Rünü. Bazı şeyleri dökmek için gerekli.
description.flake: Kar tanesi. Genellikle döküm malzemesi olarak kullanılır.
description.broken_comet_pick: Madencilik sırasında kırılan bir kuyruklu yıldız kazması. Hala kurtarılabilir.
description.broken_sparkle_pick: Madencilik sırasında kırılan bir parıldayan kazma. Hala kurtarılabilir.
description.broken_star_pick: Madencilik sırasında kırılan bir yıldız kazma. Hala kurtarılabilir.

description.incubator_egg: Kişisel evcil hayvanınızın evini aramanız için ihtiyacınız olan tek katalizör.

description.magic_watch: İhtiyacınız olduğunda zamanı yavaşlatan sihirli bir saat. Bu, günlük serinizi kurtarmak için otomatik olarak tüketilecektir!
description.pet_house: Evcil hayvanınızın yaşadığı bir ev. Belki. Bazen sadece dışarı çıkmayı severler.
description.chicken: Vejetaryen değilseniz çok lezzetli, ama bunun yerine tavuktan geliyor.
description.milk_3: Kediler için çok iyi bir yemek, öyle duydum.
description.dog_food: Köpeğinizin çok sevebileceği yiyecekler. Ya da benim gibi ekmeği daha çok sevebilirler.
description.wood: Ağaçlardan yaygın olarak düşer. Döküm için kullanışlıdır.

description.apple: Bir elma ağacını kestin ve elma kafana düştü. Ah.
description.pear: Armut ağacını kestin ve armut kafana düştü. Ah.
